elements.text: You have a busy week ahead, so you sit down to write a to-do list. Since you're writing quickly, your handwriting is harder to read, and you think about how HD might affect your handwriting permanently one day. You consider that these types of changes will be in the distant...

elements.name: Handwriting Thoughts_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
